column4: Dear all - I need some assistance in changing the date format on my ubuntu server right through the system to dd/MM/yyyy please?
that depends on the locale settings
better to stay on channel. what locale do you use in the server?
that locale implies date in month/day/year format? why do you want it in the other format ?
I am in another country: Namibia - we use the date format dd/MM/yyyy here.
change the locale to the namibian one. that way date will display the date properly formated for your country (and all other programs too)
that's the thing - there is no locale for Namibia :(
are you sure? maybe it is en_NA.UTF-8 (english namibia? ) ??
i do not see en_NA in /usr/share/i18n/SUPPORTED maybe you could use some locale that matchs the date preferences of namibia
Will try that - thanks - you've been a great help.
once you have chhosen one this is how you change it http://john.parnefjord.se/node/40
